class.rdfs:comment: A collection of music tracks in playlist form.
class.rdfs:label: MusicPlaylist

schema:numTracks.rdfs:comment: The number of tracks in this album or playlist.
schema:numTracks.rdfs:label: numTracks

schema:track.rdfs:comment: A music recording (track)—usually a single song. If an ItemList is given, the list should contain items of type MusicRecording.
schema:track.rdfs:label: track

schema:tracks.rdfs:comment: A music recording (track)—usually a single song.
schema:tracks.rdfs:label: tracks
